course_title: Special Topics: Film and Media: Intro. to Dramatic Writing
class_notes:
SAME AS ENGCW 389W 2 AND THEA 385W 1. Application required. Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) and application form available on the Creative Writing Program website.


(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
course_description: Rotating topics in film and media. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: FILM 102 and (FILM 201 or FILM 202 or FILM 203 or FILM 204) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
